artist: Engraver: A.B. Duhamel; Artist: after Claude-Louis Desrais; Author: Jean-Antoine Lebrun-Tossa; Publisher: François Buisson
creditline:
The Minnich Collection
The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund, 1966
description: Fashion periodical with green paper covers bound with two hand-colored engravings of people in fashionable period dress and a black and white engraving of a silver oil holder with two bottles
medium: Hand-colored engravings; black and white engraving; letterpress
portfolio: From Magasin des Modes nouvelles, françaises et anglaises, Paris, 1786-89
title: Magasin des Modes Nouvelles, Seconde Année, Seizième Cahier, 20 Avril 1787
